item.title: Pointers and References - Compound Types
item.description: A compound type is a type that is defined in terms of another type. C++ has several compound types, two of which‚Äîreferences and pointers A reference defines an alternative name for an object.

item.title: Visual Odometry
item.description: Visual Odometry was my main contribution to my bachelor‚Äôs degree. It represents the update step in the Kalman Filter and I based it on the lane-detection algorithm that was already implemented on the Raspberry.

item.title: Proportional-Derivative Control
item.description: This control was mainly used in my bachelor‚Äôs degree project in order to adjust the angle of the servomotor so that the ego was situating itself in the middle of the road ...

item.title: Kalman Filter
item.description: The concept of probabilistic or stochastic mathematics deals with the study and modeling of uncertainties. It seeks to combine concepts from probability theory with statistical methods to understand and make decisions under conditions of uncertainty.

item.title: Inertial Odometry
item.description: Inertial Odometry is great because it does not care of the environment variables. I used a BNO055 which is an ‚Äúabsolute orientation‚Äù sensor made by Bosch.

item.title: Gaussian Distribution
item.description: A Gaussian or normal distribution always has a bell-shaped curve and is determined by two parameters: the mean \mu and the standard deviation \sigma. The graph associated with this phenomenon is symmetric with its center at the mean, and its shape is determined by the standard deviation.

item.title: My Bachelor's Degree Thesis
item.description: In 2024 I finished my Bachelor‚Äôs studies at Technical University of Cluj-Napoca. My diploma project is intitulated Visual-Inertial Odometry based on lane-detection of an autonomous vehicle with constant speed.

item.title: C++ Basics
item.description: One of my short-term goals is learning C++ as well as possible. I used it in my Bachelors and I want to actually understand this programming language. For this, I am using as reference the C++ Primer.

item.title: Hello Hello, I'm Costin üòé
item.description: I'm a Software Engineer who graduated from Technical University of Cluj-Napoca (2020-2024). I enjoy challenging myself constantly and I want to dive deep into Machine Learning and AI this year.
